summary.name: Canon EOS R3 Manifest
summary.description: The canon EOSR3 is a Mirrorless camera released by Canon in 2021. The camera features all the latest and greatest technology, including an OLED viewfinder, 24 megapixels of resolution and a DIGIX Image processor. Not only does this camera contain a next generation image sensor that allows it to capture all 24 megapixel resolution, but it also contains a next gen processor which allows it to stabilize and auto-focus in fraction of a second. The technology inside the camera is cutting edge even 15 months after it was released. This camera did suffer from the supply chain shortage is caused by COVID-19. At a price point of $6000 the camera is part of Canonâ€™s luxury brand and was manufactured in their main factory in Japan. Canon as a company is pretty transparent about their supply chain. They are transparent about how their supply chain comes from suppliers, and through a clever workaround canon operates off of the word of their suppliers. If the suppliers say, there are no conflict minerals, canon is allowed to say there are no conflict minerals.

overview.name: Tantalum (Global Advanced Metals Pty Ltd)
overview.description: Tantalum is the result of refining Colton. Colton is a conflict a mineral meaning that it comes from countries that are torn apart by war as a result of mining practices, tantalum is incredibly useful in heat, dissipation, as well as electrical miniaturization. It is found on nearly every high end high-tech product. Canon has many suppliers of tantalum but its most transparent supplier is Global Advanced Metals Pty Ltd

overview.name: Tantalum (Global Advanced Metals Pty Ltd)
overview.description: One of Canon's other supplier of tantalum. It is also connected with Global Advanced Metals Japan. They are an ethical sourcer and reiner of tantalum. They mine from Western Australia which is ethically cleared for mining.

overview.name: Global Advanced Metals Mine
overview.description: This tantalum suplier has an ethcial mine in Western Australia. This makes their tantalum non-conflict but also more expensive.

overview.name: Global Advanced Metals Mine 2
overview.description: Global Advanced Metals has another ethical tantalum mine located in Wodgina, Australia

overview.name: Gold (Asahi Refining)
overview.description: Asahi Refining is a company who supplies Canon with gold for components. They have been in teh buisness for over 200 years and are incredibly reputable. They are als RMAP compliant(Responcible Mineals Assurance Process).

overview.name: Gold (Alexy Metals)
overview.description: Alexy Metals is a precious metals supplier for Canon. They supply and refine gold used in processors and miniturization. They specialize in recycling making them more emnvironmentaly friendly.

overview.name: Tungsten (Global Tungsten and Powders Corp.)
overview.description: GTP supplies Canon with tungsten used as a powder in miniturization and in electron emmiters.

overview.name: Tin (Metalic Resources Inc)
overview.description: Metalic Resources Inc supplies Canon their tin. Tin is used in soder for electronics. It is efficent in electrical conducivity.

overview.name: LP-E19 battery (CATL)
overview.description: The Canon EOS R3 uses Canon's LP-E19 battery. This battery is manufactured by large chinese battery firm Contemporary Amprerex Technologly Co (CATL)

overview.name: Contemporary Amperex Technology Co (Lithium Batteries)
overview.description: CATL the manufacteur of Canon's LP-E19 batteries sources its lithium from Bolivia and Chille. Lithium mining is not environmentally friendly as it consumes a large amount of water.

overview.name: Canon Oita Assembly Plant
overview.description: This is Canon's imaging technology factory. It is responcible for Canon's higher end cameras where its pricier models like the EOS R3 are manufactured. The cheaper digital cameras are mass produced in China

overview.name: CMOS Chip (ASML technologies)
overview.description: The Canon EOS R3 has a CMOS image sensor. This sensor is what is behind the lens and what captures light to form an image. These highly dense chips are manufactured by ASML technologies. They are the biggest manufacteur of these highly specific chips. They have some of the only machines capable in the industry called Semiconductor Lithography Machines. Canon is working to create their own chip factory.

overview.name: Digic-X Processor
overview.description: The Digic-X processor is what converts the image data into a visual image. It handles auto-focus and image stabilization

overview.name: Canon Warehouse USA
overview.description: Canon cameras from Japan are shipped over and held in New York before being shipped out to the other major american cities. Canon cameras are manufactured in Japan and sent over in bacthes. They are then distributed all across America. This is the first stop for a Canon camera from Japan.

location.address: Nc Head Office One Canon Parkmelville Ny 11747U

overview.name: Canon Offical Headquarters
overview.description: It is typical for companies to do reasearch and development in their headquarters. In Canon's headquarters they manage their printer buisness as well as their camera buisness. Here all the important decisons regarding products, technology and strategy occur.

overview.name: B and H photo
overview.description: B and H is a camera equiptment store that has the Canon EOS R3. They are one of the retail sides of Canon other than online purchase. They carry a sizeable ammount of the cameras and warehouse them so customers have a steady supply . They are the final step in the logistics of the Canon EOS R3.
